citation: Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Act 2006 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Act 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Forest Practices Amendment (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Act 2006 fix 30 April 2007 as the day on which that Act commences.

23 April 2007

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development and Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 April 2007

This proclamation is administered by the Forest Practices Authority.
